pages.text: Witchers can harvest trophies from their foes, or obtain them using other means. Trophies are necessary to receive rewards.

pages.title: Obtaining Trophies
pages.text: Trophies can be acquired from opponents in two distinct ways:$(br)$(li)$(l)Drop Chance$(): The first method is through random drop chance. While the Witcher Origin is installed, any player killing a contract mob without holding their respective contract has a slight chance to recieve that mob's trophy. The probability is between 1%-5%, depending on the rarity of encountering the mob (higher rarity = higher drop chance).

$(li)$(l)Contracts$(): The second, and most reliable method for the Witcher to acquire trophies is through contracts. While holding a contract for a mob, you are eligible to harvest their trophy with a 100% chance. The criteria are:$(li2)$(l:contracts/enemy_types)You must be wielding the correct blade type for the monster you are hunting in your mainhand.$()$(li2)You must deal the final blow yourself, without using projectiles. This means you cannot land a killing blow with an offhand crossbow to harvest a trophy.
